properties.name: value
properties.label: PDF Source
properties.description: Base64 encoded PDF data from the Pega property this control is placed on

properties.name: height
properties.label: Viewer Height
properties.description: Specify the height of the PDF viewer (e.g., 600px or 80vh).

properties.name: pdfProperty
properties.label: PDF Property (optional)
properties.description: Optional: Pega property that contains the PDF base64 string. If not specified, the component will read from the property it's placed on. Use this to read from a different property than the one the control is configured on.

properties.name: textHighlightJSON
properties.label: Text Highlight JSON
properties.description: JSON string for text-based highlights. The component will automatically search for and highlight these words/phrases within the PDF content. Only text and confidence are required - bounding boxes are calculated automatically.

properties.name: coordinateHighlightJSON
properties.label: Coordinate Highlight JSON
properties.description: JSON array of coordinate-based highlights. Each highlight specifies exact position coordinates (0-1 percentages) on specific pages.

properties.name: onSelectProperty
properties.label: On Select Property
properties.description: Property to update when a highlight is selected (e.g., set to the highlight id).

properties.name: searchPropRef
properties.label: Search Property Reference
properties.description: Property to bind the search term to (the control will write the search term to this property when typing).

properties.name: enableSearch
properties.label: Enable Search UI
properties.description: When true, shows a search input above the viewer and writes the term to the configured Search Property Reference.

properties.name: enableDebugging
properties.label: Enable Debug Information
properties.description: When true, displays debug information in the browser console showing which properties are being read and their values.

properties.name: confidenceFilter
properties.label: Confidence Filter (min)
properties.description: Minimum confidence (0-1) to display highlights. Can be a literal or a PROPERTY reference.
